item.title: Normalizing heterogeneous decimal Ion data in Athena
item.description: Recently, we exported data from a DynamoDB table to S3 in AWS Ion format. However, due to the fact that the DynamoDB table had varied formats for some numeric properties, the export serialized these numeric data columns in a few different formats: as a decimal (1234.), as an Ion decimal type (1234d0), and as a string ("1234"). However, we want to be able to treat these values as a bigint within our Athena queries.
